title: YunoHost LXC
textContent:
YunoHost LXC 
                YunoHost is an
                    operating
                    system aiming for the simplest administration of a server, and therefore democratize self-hosting,
                    while
                    making sure it stays reliable, secure, ethical and lightweight.
                To create a new Proxmox VE YunoHost LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/yunohost.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 20GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                YunoHost Interface: IP/
outerHTML:
YunoHost LXC

YunoHost is an operating system aiming for the simplest administration of a server, and therefore democratize self-hosting, while making sure it stays reliable, secure, ethical and lightweight.

To create a new Proxmox VE YunoHost LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/yunohost.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 20GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

YunoHost Interface: IP/
